query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, tc.userId, u.name as collaborator_name, tc.permission 
FROM trips t 
JOIN trip_collaborators tc ON t.id = tc.tripId 
JOIN users u ON tc.userId = u.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT t.id, t.name, tc.userId, u.name as collaborator_name, tc.permission 
FROM trips t 
JOIN trip_collaborators tc ON t.id = tc.tripId 
JOIN users u ON tc.userId = u.id;
